## utils.xml.textToDomDocument() function

Converts an XML string into a DOM tree.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function textToDomDocument(text: string): Document;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | string | XML string. |

<b>Returns:</b>

The DOM document.

if XML doesn't parse.
